description: In this data challenge, participants were tasked with developing models to diagnose five different machine states. The monitored machine is an oil-injection screw compressor with a motor of 15 kW operating at 3,600 rpm and a screw rotating speed of 7,200 rpm. Two channels are captured during experiments: vibration from the motor and vibration from the screw. The data is gathered with a sampling rate of 10,544 samples per second.

system.2. machine: Motor 15kW, Axis rotating speed of Motor: 3,600 rpm, Axis rotating speed of Screw: 7,200 rpm
system.3. sensors: Channel 1: Measuring vibration from Motor. Channel 2: Measuring vibration from Screw
system.4. adquisition: Sampling rate of Data Acquisition: 1. 10,544 samples per second

references.citation: Seijun Chung, SeongyeopJeong. (2021). Data Challenge at PHM Asia Pacific 2021. Kaggle. https://kaggle.com/competitions/phmap21-classification-task
